intension: Promote a spa salon event featuring a 3-hour masterclass on DIY skin care using organic skincare products and soap. The event will take place on March 8 at 2 PM. The image is a Facebook event cover.
globalcaption: The image features a wooden table with a variety of soap bars and other items on it. There are four soap bars in total, with one located on the left side of the table, another in the middle, and two more on the right side. \n\nIn addition to the soap bars, there are two towels on the table, one on the left side and another on the right side. A potted plant can be seen in the background, adding a touch of greenery to the scene. The table is set up for a DIY skin care class, inviting participants to learn and create their own skin care products.
keywords: organic, soap, natural, beauty, spa, soap, herbal, aroma, aromatherapy, bar, handmade, flowers, salon, masterclass, event, facebook, event cover, cover, fb
